title: Cleanup some unused and unnecessary code
description: Several classes in trunk have some unused and unnecessary code. This includes unused fields, unused automatic variables, unused imports and unnecessary assignments. Attached it a patch to clean these up.

comments.content:
Patch looks good!  Though StandardTokenizerImpl.java is generated from
JFlex so we can't change that.

I will commit shortly.  Thanks Nathan!
comments.author: Michael McCandless

comments.content:
Thanks for applying my patch.

Sorry about the generated file; i missed the comment at the top of the file.
comments.author: Nathan Beyer
